## RSSFeedItem interface

An individual item (from <item>) found within an RSS Feed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RSSFeedItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [description?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.description.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Description of the feed item. |
|  [explicit?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.explicit.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If the feed item is marked explicit. |
|  [feedTitle](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.feedtitle.md) | string | The title of the feed the item belongs to.<!-- -->This is primarily used to remind listeners what feed the feed item came from. |
|  [id?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.id.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The GUID of the feed item. |
|  [image?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.image.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> URL for the image |
|  [length?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.length.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The length within the <enclosure> tag. |
|  [link?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.link.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The link of the feed item.<!-- -->This is typically where users can find more information about the RSS feed item and not the actual media content. |
|  [mediaType?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.mediatype.md) | "video/mpeg" \| "audio/mpeg" | <i>(Optional)</i> The media type within the <enclosure> tag. |
|  [pubDate?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.pubdate.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Date the feed item was published.<!-- -->RFC 822 encoded date string, in accordance with the RSS 2.0 specification.<!-- -->One exception is the year may be expressed with two digits instead of the preferred four digits. |
|  [subtitle?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.subtitle.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The subtitle of the feed item. |
|  [title?](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.title.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The title of the feed item. |
|  [url](./stentor-models.rssfeeditem.url.md) | string | The URL within the <enclosure> tag. |
